name: ^. BATWORLD .^
description:
a long-form twine by POLYMER DESPAIR

Generate a bat of your very own, selecting from such options as ear length, overall size and diet, then explore the enchanting batworld, a planet much like our own in the sense that there are bats in both of 'em.

Will your bat stockpile food for winter? Make friends with other bats? Master the art of flying? Or will they search for the secret to confronting the mysterious white storm? Only you can decide!

FEATURING:

  • 8 endings, including one secret ending!
  • at least 6 bat stats to train and/or select
  • 13 nights of exhilarating text-based gameplay
  • 20,000 words of original, bat-based story
  • 3 story routes; will your bat befriend the weird widow nanny veldkamp, the lonely researcher sam oensis, or the troublesome nycter kids? how about all of them?
  • the patented new bat plus mode
  • more bats than you can shake a stick (with a bat on it) at!
